title: Future Simple (will/going to)
content: Tomorrow, I [will|going to] visit my grandmother. She [is going to|will] bake cookies for us. We [will|going to] probably watch a movie together.
explanationEnUs: 'Will' is often used for predictions or spontaneous decisions. 'Going to' is used for planned actions.
explanationZhTw: 'Will' 通常用於預測或臨時決定。'Going to' 用於計劃好的行動。
explanationZhCn: 'Will' 通常用于预测 or 临时决定。'Going to' 用于计划好的行动。

title: Future Continuous
content: At 8 PM tonight, I [will be watching|will watch] TV. Don't call me then. We [will be having|will have] dinner at that time.
explanationEnUs: Future Continuous (will be + -ing) is used for actions that will be in progress at a specific time in the future.
explanationZhTw: 未來進行式 (will be + -ing) 用於描述在未來特定時間正在進行的動作。
explanationZhCn: 未来进行时 (will be + -ing) 用于描述在未来特定时间正在进行的动作。

title: Future Perfect
content: By next year, I [will have graduated|will graduate] from college. She [will have finished|will finish] her project by Friday.
explanationEnUs: Future Perfect (will have + past participle) describes an action that will be completed before a specific time in the future.
explanationZhTw: 未來完成式 (will have + 過去分詞) 描述在未來特定時間之前將完成的動作。
explanationZhCn: 未来完成时 (will have + 过去分词) 描述在未来特定时间之前将完成的动作。

title: Future Perfect Continuous
content: By 2025, I [will have been working|will work] here for ten years. They [will have been waiting|will wait] for hours by the time we arrive.
explanationEnUs: Future Perfect Continuous emphasizes the duration of an action up to a certain point in the future.
explanationZhTw: 未來完成進行式強調持續到未來某一點的動作的時間長度。
explanationZhCn: 未来完成进行时强调持续到未来某一点的动作的时间长度。

title: Mixed Future Tenses
content: Look at those clouds! It [is going to|will] rain. I think I [will|am going to] stay inside.
explanationEnUs: Use 'going to' for evidence-based predictions (clouds). Use 'will' for opinions or offers (I think...).
explanationZhTw: 有證據的預測（雲）用 'going to'。意見或提議（我想...）用 'will'。
explanationZhCn: 有证据的预测（云）用 'going to'。意见 or 提议（我想...）用 'will'。
